definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The favorable reservoir in Cambrian stratum is dolostone of Sansanzi formation.
sentences.chinese: 盆地西緣寒武系有利儲層主要爲三山子組白雲岩儲層。

sentences.english: Geological Features of Lacustrine Dolomite Reservoir in the Hinterland of Biyang Sag.
sentences.chinese: 泌陽凹陷腹部湖相白雲岩油藏地質特徵。

sentences.english: The name given to dolomitized limestone.
sentences.chinese: 對白雲岩化的石灰岩的命名。

sentences.english: This type of dolomite controls the development of porosity.
sentences.chinese: 此種成因的白雲岩對孔隙的發育起控制作用。

sentences.english: The sonic log is used to differentiate shale from dolomite.
sentences.chinese: 聲波測井用於區分泥岩和白雲岩。

sentences.english: Intersalt dolomites are both source and reservoir formations.
sentences.chinese: 江漢盆地鹽間白雲岩既是烴源巖又是非常規儲集層。

sentences.english: Pietramezzana, a remote village in the Lucan Dolomites, is likely to disappear.
sentences.chinese: 在路坎白雲岩的一個偏僻的村莊，很可能會消失。

sentences.english: Of all the types of reservoir rocks, the content of bitumen is the most abundant in the oolitic dolomite.
sentences.chinese: 儲集孔隙發育的殘餘鮞粒白雲岩的瀝青含量最高。
